question: 駅前
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>station</kanji> <kanji>front</kanji> is the <vocabulary>front of station</vocabulary>. This word is great for telling people where you want to meet, by the way.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is like two separate words put together into one, so you can imagine it's the kun'yomi readings. You learned the right reading for <ja>駅</ja> in the kanji, and you should know the vocab word <ja>前</ja> by now. Combine the two together and you have yourself <vocabulary>front of station</vocabulary>.
